testcase.name: Free CRM Deals Test Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page for deals test..........................passed When title of login page is Free CRM for deals test.........................passed Then user enters username and password for deals test.......................passed Then user clicks on login button for deals test.............................passed Then user is on home page for deals test....................................passed Then user moves to new deals page...........................................passed Then user enters deals details..............................................passed Then Close the browser of deals page........................................passed
